author: Ron Wilkinson
content: That schooner is awesome! The rich are arrogant.

author: Rick Spilman
content: Science: Rich People Are More Likely To Cheat And Steal Than The Poor

author: Rick Spilman
content:
Read the last paragraph again. He is also out the over $28 million he paid for the painting.

“However, Spanish authorities were tipped off and raided in the superyacht while it was anchored off the Corsican town of Calvi. Head of a Young Woman was seized and transferred to the Reina Sofia museum in Madrid, where it remains.”

author: Willy
content: Sounds like he already sold it. So he didnt lose any money. Just jail time.

author: Doug Bostrom
content: Funny how billionaires often end up self-caricaturing.
